    • Method Detail

      • add

        @RequestMapping(value="/item/add")
public void add(@RequestParam(value="description")
                                                    java.lang.String description,
                                                    @RequestParam(value="price")
                                                    java.lang.Double price)
        calls the cart controller and add a new item in the cart
        Parameters:
        description - the item name
        price - the unity price of the item

      • add

        @RequestMapping(value="/item/add/quantity")
public void add(@RequestParam(value="description")
                                                             java.lang.String description,
                                                             @RequestParam(value="price")
                                                             java.lang.Double price,
                                                             @RequestParam(value="quantity")
                                                             int quantity)
        calls the cart controller and add a new itemLine with a specific quantity ot items
        Parameters:
        description - the name of the item
        price - the unity price of the item
        quantity - the quantity of the same item

      • findAll

        @RequestMapping(value="/item/all")
public java.util.List<ItemLines> findAll()
        calls the cart controller to find all the itemLines of the cart
        Returns:
        a List of ItemLines with all the itemLines of the cart

      • findOne

        @RequestMapping(value="/item")
public ItemLines findOne(@RequestParam(value="description")
                                                         java.lang.String description)
        calls the cart controller to find a specific item
        Parameters:
        description - the name of the item
        Returns:
        the ItemLines of the item

      • deleteItem

        @RequestMapping(value="/item/delete")
public void deleteItem(@RequestParam(value="description")
                                                              java.lang.String description)
        calls the cart controller to find a specific item an delete its line
        Parameters:
        description - the name of the item

      • updateItem

        @RequestMapping(value="/item/update/quantity")
public void updateItem(@RequestParam(value="description")
                                                                       java.lang.String description,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="quantity")
                                                                       int quantity)
        calls the cart controller to change the quantity of an item
        Parameters:
        description - the name of the item
        quantity - the new Quantity

      • buyCart

        @RequestMapping(value="/item/buy")
public ShoppingRepository buyCart()
        calls the cart controller and clear the shopping cart after return it
        Returns:
        the shopping cart

      • getLinePrice

        @RequestMapping(value="/price/line")
public double getLinePrice(@RequestParam(value="description")

        Returns:
